## RefParams interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RefParams<GRefKey extends string = 'ref'> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [refKey](./react.refparams.refkey.md) | <code>GRefKey</code> | A custom ref key which allows a reference to be obtained from non standard components. |
